parameter.value: I work in this depot, as a seller of parcels and letters.
The mailing system works so that you are able to send parcels or letters to all the cities.
If you don't know how the depot works, I will tell you. Just step infront of it, and you are able to store all your personal items in the depot box in front of you. It's perfectly safe.
I am Agorn Sillybolt. Nice to meet you, too.
You can send parcels and letters to Casteldine.
I have heard an ancient ritual temple has been found in the old rotworm cave in the north part of this town. Perhaps there might be something exciting there.
Natalon, the one who saved Casteldine from destruction, comes from this town. We are very proud of this.
You are of course able to send parcels and letters to this city too.
Tha'Reen is located on Duswit, in the far south. You may send parcels and letters to that city.
Celeres is the city in the east. You can send parcels aswell as letters to this city.
Lithaton is the main continent on which we stand at this very moment.
I am the king loyal, of course.
My last name is Sillybolt. I don't remember how my parents got it, but it wasn't their real name. They were paladins, by the way.
